Name: SOCRadarTAXII
Author: SOCRadar - integration@socradar.io
Description: The [SOCRadar TAXII](https://socradar.io/) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables ingestion of threat intelligence indicators (IOCs) via TAXII 2.1 protocol. Includes hybrid architecture with Azure Function for STIX parsing.
WorkbookBladeDescription: This solution installs a workbook to monitor TAXII ingestion health and IOC statistics.
HuntingQueryBladeDescription: This solution installs hunting queries for IOC analysis and threat hunting.
PlaybooksBladeDescription: This solution installs playbooks for TAXII 2.1 ingestion with cursor-based pagination and state management.
PlaybookDescription: TAXII 2.1 ingestion with cursor-based pagination, state persistence, and Azure Function integration for STIX parsing.
Creates infrastructure for TAXII state management and audit logging.
